paper_abstract: In this paper, we find that Property P can be generalized to characterize the solvability of a kind of networks with any number of sources, thus partially answering the open problem as to whether there are properties similar to Property P to characterize the solvability of some networks. As an application, for a given integer n, we construct such a solvable network that has no solvable solution if its alphabet size is less than n.
paper_title: A characterization of solvability for a class of networks
